programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin starving to death.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy picks up the rangers new guitar and tries to win over his she-bear with the greatest rock concert in Nutty Hill history.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events.

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: A match between heroes and villains gets out of hand: powers, traps, and double goals decide who wins the most epic duel in Kaboom City.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffy and Jerry are brushing their teeth. Tuffys so tired he uses Jerrys tail instead of his toothbrush. They climb in their respective beds, only Tuffys not in his bed, hes in the palm of Toms hand that Toms made-up to look like a bed. Tom gets walloped for his little stunt but it points out to Jerry that he needs a safer home. What begins with Jerry securing his home from Tom, turns into an arms race between the cat and mouse where they each build their own booby-trapped bunker to protect themselves from each other. They turn out to be their own greatest enemy, with the biggest threat coming from their own creations. In the end, they go back to their relatively safer existence.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While using a wand to make inanimate objects come to life to attack Jerry, Tom accidentally zaps a marionette (Marie Antoin-marionette). Now the cat and mouse have more on their hands than either one of them can handle! Sure the marionette pulls Hildie and Beaties heart-strings when they are around (both are thrilled to have another girl in the house even if she is made of wood), but the doll delights in getting Tom into trouble when the witch sisters arent looking. When Marie becomes too much for even Jerry to bear, Tom and Jerry have to figure out how to get rid of the little hellion! They brought her into this world, now theyve got to take her out!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its summer, and Spikes the primary beneficiary of Ricks daily grilling ritual: the pooch is tossed a nice juicy T-bone nightly. When Spike gets stuck trying to exit the doghouse, he realizes its time to back off the beef.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Little Quacker is heartsick and hes come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quackers honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and hes counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry arent about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cats Meow Dance Competition is coming up and Toodles dance partner has gone missing! In the meantime, Toodles needs a new dance partner in case hers doesnt turn up. Butch and Tom go toe-to-toe for the honor. But when Tom manages to nab the spot, he winds up disappearing, too! Now its up to Jerry to solve the case!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch and a squirrel detective have set up shop across the street from Tom and Jerry and are stealing all their customers by using high-tech devices to solve crimes. Tom and Jerry challenge them to a competition to solve one final case - they must either find a goldfishs missing gold chest or close up shop.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A battle leads Tom to chase Jerry into the Natural History Museum. The chase continues until they realize theyve been locked inside.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today theyre going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Toms house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouses down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, its an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out hes not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; theyre covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dogs behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks – with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: It’s the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame we’ll never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil’ Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribe’s prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Yosemite Sam to build a dude ranch. Sam hurries the crew along, negatively impacting their work.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Gossamer extends a camping trip invitation to the Looney Builders; their plans for a basic campsite shift when Daffy convinces the group to experience glamping instead.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Daffy invites the crew to take a mud soak in his truck bed, and it turns out to be anything but relaxing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.desc: Spikes bones are missing, and Frankie the Rat is the culprit. Now all they have to do is catch in the dirty rat in the act.

Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: You never can tell when inspiration’s gonna strike. Specs and Skinny are having a nice evening at the theatre, enjoying a magic show, when the perfect Lamput-catching strategy falls right in their lap! “The perfect strategy” is a magic necklace of invisibility. “Falling in their lap” is stealing it from the magician’s dressing room. Specs and Skinny waste no time tracking Lamput down and ruining a perfectly good picnic. As usual the Docs snatch defeat from the jaws of victory when Lamput gets a hold of the necklace. Now the orange blob can morph AND go invisible. No fair!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks got a procedure the next day that requires him not to eat or drink for 12 hours. Thats not a lot of time for a human, but to Rick its a lifetime. He makes a house rule if he cant eat, no one can. Jerry and Spike have a stockpile.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany-- HES LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word – furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy (nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerrys spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and its about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Toms hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, hes sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case theyre working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, hes in traction and cant move. Thats okay, hes got a partner in crime-solving – Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerrys home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Frankys a no-good, dirty rat. He doesnt play fair. Hes a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks theyre soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger leave Tom home alone, Tom and Jerry decide to invite their lady friends Toodles and Toots over for a romantic dinner. Things dont go as planned when they start to all get in each others way and food fights and tempers rise as dinner goes haywire.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary.

programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. programme.desc: Ella finds her Nannys old Hide and Peek device and hopes to beat Slippys record for Hide and Seek! Gem and I.Lo are playing too. Slippy decides to make things more interesting by siphoning fuel from the Hide and Peek.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Glitch’s compartment empties out and a huge amount of junk floats out, Ella suggests that Slippy get rid of it. They all head to Vesta. Slippy is enchanted by the amount of stuff on the planetoid. Madhu finds something that looks like a robot so the gang sets out to find the other pieces. They quickly put together an impressive robot they call Victor. Victor is designed to recycle and he happily does just that. But when Slippy brings him back to the Clubhouse, they soon realise Victor needs to be in his home.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Its Priyas birthday, so the gang is looking for something special as a gift for her. Ella suggests a birthday star, which is a star that is the same light years away as your age.

programme.desc: Ella stretches the truth a bit when she tells Angelie she can comet surf. She decides to try but finds its a lot harder than it looks. Slippy adds rockets to an asteroid so Ella can practice on that instead.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerrys mouse hole, the video instantly goes viral and Tom becomes the laughing stock of the feline community. Now Tom must restore his reputation by catching Jerry and capturing it all on video. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. Its up to the duo to see whats really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom cant pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry whos trying to protect him!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing…Tom is writing a novel - its a mystery novel, of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first, Tom has fun crafting his own fate, but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story, he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat, Butch, is up to no good – in the end, Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Toms discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs prove their inventing skills by coming up with an age-altering time-ray. This breakthrough could change the world. If they used it for something other than chasing Lamput. Obsessed much, fellas? Wildly shooting their time-ray off in public causes a not-unsurprising amount of chaos, until the local law enforcement gets caught in the cross-fire. Looks like the Specs and Skinny are gonna be in jail till they get old the normal way.

But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean loses a strangers engagement ring and has to get it back in time for the proposal!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In a freak accident involving the Shrink Gun, a potted plant at the Docs home scales up into a giant beanstalk taking Lamput with it! Up there beyond the clouds, the Docs and Lamput discover a giant world inhabited by a giant Mustache man. To make matters worse, Skinny gets trapped under the giants shoe and is carried away to the giants den. Specs and Lamput now need to rescue Skinny without alerting the giant and together they have to escape back to their world below.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The carnival is in town! The Docs chase Lamput into the clowns fun house, much to the clowns annoyance, and its no fun for the Docs, too.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed during his nap by a few uncatchable flies which buzz incessantly around his head. When he realizes that the carnivorous plant upon which the Lemmings are playing rodeo feeds off flying insects, he decides to confiscate it and use it as an anti-fly weapon.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings dont agree about how often the cabins new cuckoo clock should play its song.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry must solve the case of why Red Herring keeps hearing people laughing at him when theres no one around.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry try to break in to a chicken coop to steal eggs and end up defending the chickens from unknown intruders.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom uses a baby goat to mow the manors lawn, but it turns out the baby goat wants to eat everything in the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom lands in a haunted castle, where he, Jerry and Tuffy must outrun an invisible cat.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: As Rick and Ginger prepare for a costume party, Tom tries to score some snacks. Jerry and Tuffy are out to do the same. Spike and Tom are initially confused by the guests costumes. Determined to get their paws on as much party food as they can, however, they contrive their own costumes to crash the party. Will they get away with it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On the outskirts of Catsylvania, zombie cats pop up out of the ground as Tom passes a cemetery, so Tom runs to Jerry Van Mouseling for help. At first, the mouse thinks Tom is a zombie cat or Frankenstein-cat and tries repelling him. However, once Jerry understands the problem, he and his band of angry peasant mice help fight the zombie cats.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is stuck in a lift and starts to annoy the other passengers.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Bean’s bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in a trance – barks like a dog and starts to dance.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is wracked with guilt after he chases Scrapper and ends up with a flattened cat.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesn’t trust.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes trick or treating to the next level in a war with his next-door neighbours!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they don’t.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: While on vacation, The Looney Builders befriend Coco the Crab and offer to build her a mini-resort. They shrink down for a micro-build and must rely on the island’s natural resources to get the job done.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Marvin the Martian and his Martian crew a space station. / The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Lola leads the crew in washing their vehicles only to discover she mixed up the job assignments.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The detectives across the hall are responsible for a series of high profile thefts and are framing innocent people for the crimes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse are hired to find out who absconded with Hoops McJumpalots lucky high top sneakers.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Spike get glued together.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of caring for the Duchess French Poodle and needs Tuffy and Jerrys help in keeping the ill-tempered mutt under control.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things get crazy down on the farm when a cat and mouse pursuit leads Jerry to hide his turtle egg in a hens nest.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the Jack and the Beanstalk story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is enjoying his bath time while Jerry bathes Tuffy. Tuffy ends up floating off in a bubble and lands in Toms bath. Jerry throws in all of the bath bombs creating a massive amount of bubbles. In the end, they all work together to get clean.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean loses a strangers engagement ring and has to get it back in time for the proposal!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a spooky castle on the hill. The Docs, hot on Lamputs heels, find an unattended broomstick, and, typically, their first instinct is to use it to try to squish their orange quarry. But they quickly discover the broomstick has other, way cooler, uses. Before long the Docs are engaged in some high-speed, unlicenced magical broomstick-riding. Luckily for Lamput, the castles owner steps in. Shes green and witchy, and pretty annoyed about being disturbed from her moonbaking. When the docs break her magical broom, she flies into full witch-mode. Everyone gets transformed into frogs. Which, for Lamput, is a normal day at the office.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dismantles the toboggan built by the Lemmings in the log cabin and reemploys the bamboo sticks to build a jacuzzi.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Magnetikus guides a giant meteor toward Kaboom City. Astroturbo, a newcomer, must stop it before it ends Kaboom City.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom ends up on the losing end of a little cat and mouse AGAIN Butch sends in Meathead, a pinch hitter, to deal with Jerry. Surprisingly, Meathead has no trouble catching the little mouse. Theres nothing Tom or Jerry can do to make it harder. Jerrys superior intelligence is no match for Meatheads dumb luck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A battle leads Tom to chase Jerry into the Natural History Museum. The chase continues until they realize theyve been locked inside.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today theyre going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Toms house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby works on creating a formula for a love potion, which accidentally gets on Jerry when Napoleon tries to use it against Tom. Napoleon must work with Hamster and Bot to stop Tom from eating a lovestruck Jerry. Things go awry as his potions create a range of emotions from all the lab residents.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to retrieve a football from a haunted house … and get back out alive.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally creates an amazing new perfume; but who likes it more? Mrs. Wicket or Scrapper?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean fights a losing battle with a winged beast from Hell.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organised a mega-party, leading to the cabin being invaded by bats.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings activate the air conditioners AI, causing it to fall in love with the fridge

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a polar bear and realises they are from the same species.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree that casts maledictions.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a futuristic underground site.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he can’t watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China, but the crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favourite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critter’s arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their customer, Speedy Gonzalez.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Easter Bunny is sick, so she hires The Looney Builders to take over the festivities and ensure Looneyburg has a great Easter.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger take Tom and Butch on a cruise ship. Jerry and Tuffy leave to explore the ships buffet and leave Spike and Tom in the room. They all meet Meathead, a vicious ship cat who will stop at nothing to terrorize the four of them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger take Tom and Spike on a road trip to Gingers aunts house where Spike is terrorized by a dog traveling in a trailer. Meanwhile, Jerry and Tuffy cause problems when they get caught in Rick and Gingers suitcase.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune-telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesnt like, he tries everything to avoid it. In fact, everything that Tom does to avoid his future only seems to make it worse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones. The detectives investigate a community garden, and it seems like their number-one suspect is an elusive gopher. It turns out that Tyke dug up all of his dads bones and was saving them as a birthday present for Spike.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Slippy needs iron to fix his spaceracer. Ella tows him to a metal asteroid where Glitch is instructed to cut off a small piece. But when Ella distracts him, he accidentally cuts the asteroid into two large pieces! Ella feels responsible

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella is excited to get her own room but Tilly is not as thrilled. She asks Slippy if he can make her a time machine to slow down time so tomorrow never comes. Slippy says the only place time shows down is around black holes.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella has her best idea yet for a fun day. They will visit a nebula for each member of the family! Up first is Bernard 68, but it is very dark and frightens Tilly. When Dads truck breaks down, they head to the Boomerang nebula.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The gang is practicing to play Saturn Dance with Priya when she calls to tell them she is sick. She wont be able to come. Ella is very disappointed and wonders how they can cheer up Priya.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Slippy, Madhu and Ella head out to see a SuperNova, they arrive too late because of Slippys endless preparations. The gang quickly decide to go zip-lining on Ganymede instead.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Toad resolves to keep fit in order to win the racing challenge thrown down by the weasels.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: When Toad practises opera singing, he is so dreadful he has to practise high in the sky in his hot air balloon. Could he end up being the first Toad in space?

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Heron struggles to deliver her care package to Badger in deep fog and soon finds herself surrounded by ravenous weasels. Can Toad and his friends rescue her in time?

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Adder convinces Toad that her marvellous mud has rejuvenating qualities so that she can be on the front cover of Riverbank Heroes magazine.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Toad, Ratty, Mole and Hedge help Portly to find some bees to draw, but Toads hiccups ensure they cant get close enough for drawing or honey.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers that, in the world of organised crime, a teddy isn’t always a teddy. Sometimes it’s a rabbit.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the worlds second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East And Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, well tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Experienced anchors report and discuss the days biggest business and economic developments in the United States and around the world, offering their unique perspectives and detailed analyses with timely updates on the markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Bloomberg Open Interest with Matt Miller and Dani Burger - delivers the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trumps administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily

programme.title: Ant Anstead: Born Mechanic
programme.desc: Ant hopes restoring and selling a 1980 Triumph Dolomite Sprint will help kickstart his farmhouse renovation. But will rust problems erode his profit?

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Tony battles a big beaver to get at the gold, while Parker poaches more crew, doubling gold production. Rick tries to strike a deal for a new claim.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Slim Pickings are a man down when Lee shocks Roger with an injury. Plagued yet again by machinery failure, the Blacklighters are forced to a halt.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike buys an ex-drift Caterham SV. Its had a hard life, but Mike gets a keen deal and tasks Edd with adding looks, power and luxury to up the selling price. Edd meets the challenge and decides to paint the car a shocking color.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew buys a haul of rare furniture and what he says is the worst chair hes ever bought, wades through mountains of film and television paraphernalia, then leaves no corner unchecked at a lace factory where he literally goes home with the kitchen sink.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer takes a risk at auction by purchasing a late Alfasud 1.5 TI with no service history, dodgy brakes, and clapped out suspension, hoping mechanic Edd China can work his usual magic on the vehicle

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike heads out to Poland to bag a Lamborghini Uracco. However, the price of this classic is rising due to Lamborghinis 50th anniversary, can Mike bag a bargain?

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Find out how throttle bodies, limestone fireplace mantels, candied fruit and jellies, and linen ukuleles are made.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Provides an insight into the methods used to produce the worlds softest duvets, to drill for oil thousands of metres below ground, and to put the stretch into rubber bands.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: In a quiet South London suburb, Drew comes face to face with the most extraordinary collection of American automobilia hes ever seen, including Evel Knievels Messerschmitt.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Upholsterer Craig must be extremely careful when working on a rare French chair. Meanwhile, lighting expert Jolene gets forceful with a 200-year-old lantern.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Home seekers across the US look to seriously downsize! They check out three tiny properties under 600 sq ft before choosing the perfect compact home.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: To celebrate their 100th car Mike and Edd restore a Darracq Type L. Will they be ready in time to face their toughest ever test drive - the London to Brighton Run?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike has unearthed a quintessential piece of British motoring history with a Rover P5 B. The car appears to be in good nick, but Edds upgrades wont come cheap.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: A smart city car- the Panda is also a surprisingly good off road hack. Mike tracks down a model with potential, Edd does the mechanics, and they try to turn a profit.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer takes a risk at auction by purchasing a late Alfasud 1.5 TI with no service history, dodgy brakes, and clapped out suspension, hoping mechanic Edd China can work his usual magic on the vehicle

programme.title: Naked And Afraid: Castaways
programme.desc: Ravaged by bugs, Heather must move camp. But with no map, the gruelling trek puts Andrews challenge at risk.

programme.title: Mike Brewers World Of Cars
programme.desc: Mike meets an award-winning hot rodder, the legendary Gene Winfield. Hes run his own creations on the salt flats and dry lake beds where hot rodding began.

programme.title: Mike Brewers World Of Cars
programme.desc: Mike looks at classic cars future in a world with more electric cars. He heads to EV West, which puts electric motors into everything from Porsches to VW vans.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Over 35 million people love to surf, so how do they make the perfect board for catching waves? Plus, the world eats 10 million tonnes of butter a year - how do they do it?

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items are put under the microscope. What does it take to make motorcycle engines, glass enamel sculptures, hand-made paper and vaulting poles?

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Tom And Thomas buy a 71 Pontiac GTO, but realize its not worth rebuilding, so heavy machinery is brought in to deal with the GTO!

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: In Barcelona, Mike and Elvis try to restore a SEAT 600, but an unexpected breakdown and some nasty bills put the boys profit margin in peril.

programme.title: Fast N Loud
programme.desc: After building more cars than they can count, Richard and Aaron take a much-needed break so they can finally answer some of the questions their fans have sent in.

programme.title: Fast N Loud
programme.desc: Richards plan to reveal the Krew Kut Dually at the Lone Star Throwdown hits a snag. With no top on the car, heavy rain forces the crew to change their plans.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: The Kilchers take on two massive jobs - moving the historic Octagon building to safety while also finishing Shanes multi-year cabin build.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew spots a 1960s Mini that may be for sale - can he buy it at a good price? And, a Cotswold dealer has a Porsche 928, but the budget is hit by some major repairs.

programme.title: Ant Anstead: Born Mechanic

But Bluey insists they find another way, because games are more fun if you follow the rules. They make a break for a moving cloud shadow and make it back just in time.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At the weekend, Bluey and Bingo are playing Statues with Dad - Bingo is a magical moving statue that Dad keeps trying to return to Bluey the shopkeeper. With the game in full swing, Bingo gasps in wonder as she discovers a walking leaf insect in the garden. She whispers to Dad to come and see, but he is too distracted chasing Bluey and it flies away. Later at bedtime, Bingo is upset that Dad didn’t get to see the walking leaf but she’s cheered up when Dad apologises, explaining that he was distracted by a cheeky magic statue. programme.title: Bandeenheden i Manchester
programme.desc: Politiets enhed for organiseret kriminalitet fører en storstilet operation mod områdets mest magtfulde narkobande. I sagen om økseangrebet dukker et nyt vidne op: en mand, der er blevet bortført af banden og hævder at være blevet tvunget til at sælge stoffer for dem. Han fortæller politiet, at han var øjenvidne til angrebet. Lykkes det politiet at nedkæmpe banden en gang for alle?
