programme.desc: Caillou spends a day outside finding different ways to play in the snow.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou and his family go to a tree farm to find a holiday tree.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Sonny is trying to prove himself to be a useful engine so that he can stay working on Sodor, but nobody seems to trust him... nobody apart from Diesel, that is! But can Diesel be trusted?

programme.title: Chuggington 02
programme.desc: When Irving leaves Koko in charge of the recycling yard, she’s keen to show how responsible she is. In fact she’s so excited, that she doesn’t listen properly to his instructions. She ropes Wilson into helping her, and loves having an ‘employee’ to boss around. Because she hasn’t listened, things go very wrong: machinery gets clogged with paper, the pallets get knocked over - and Wilson accidentally drops a car full of recycling onto the crusher! Irving returns to find the yard in chaos.

programme.title: Chuggington 02
programme.desc: Koko and Brewster are going to the forest to pick up some wood and take it to the paper mill. Wilson wishes he could go, but he has to pick up a roll of special paper for the printers. In the forest, Brewster and Koko start to play and unknowingly break a water pipe that gushes everywhere. Hearing it, Koko thinks it’s a waterfall. When the three trainees cross paths later, Koko tells Wilson about it, and they decide to find it. But they discover it’s not a waterfall at all. It’s a leaking pipe! Koko must have broken it by accident. She and Brewster go for help.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: For their nature activity, Medhi suggests that the children go on a jungle safari! The children are very enthusiastic and hope to see monkeys, crocodiles and a lion! But when they arrive in the forest, theyre very disappointed because they cant see anything special... Medhi asks them to open their eyes wide because wild animals are hiding in the wild!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty takes Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave ten pin bowling in the jungle with Bobby the Monkey, so Dave can learn how to be a star bowler. Using coconut bowling balls and special jungle ‘pin-pins’ they soon learn how hard it is to knock down all ten pins in one go. But with a little practice and some good teamwork, Dave and all his friends become champion bowlers!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Who is little but knows how to defend himself? Doodleboo explains how to draw a Crab

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: As Jane and Zumi explore the African forest at dusk, their excitement turns to concern when they find fruit trees whose leaves are eaten up by Giant African Snails. Seeking assistance, Jane contacts the Junior Rangers, prompting Leo, Katie, and Hero to investigate. The team identifies the snails as an invasive species to the environment. They swiftly travel to the forest and unite with Jane and Zumi to capture the snails. They meet up with Ranger Rocky who questions the condition of the trees and they fill him in which prompts him to call Ranger Joey who provides critical information about the snails habits and risks. Evening comes which reveals more snails emerging from the ground, and the team work together in an effort to catch them all. Leo finds a way to get the snails to come to them by covering Ranger Rocky in leaves and this works as a group of snails ends up on Ranger Rocky. The united effort successfully saves the trees from further harm. Ranger Rocky assures the team he’ll come back the next night to check if there are any more snails around. Back at the Treehouse, Leo calls it a mission accomplished and Katie finds an amusing way to make Hero eat his greens.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry becomes sad because he can not climb on the rainbow but Dolly makes him happy with an exceptionally creative present.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly 01 Mepe
programme.desc: The characters in the Berry and Dolly stories are a bunch of tiny bugs and beetles who live alongside one another in the forest. The stories are lead by the title characters: Berry the snail and Dolly the ladybird. A variety of other characters join them in their fun and games throughout the series with the stories set in their forest home. All the characters’ houses, belongings and clothes perfectly match their individual appearance.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly 01 Mepe 1007 - Christmas
programme.desc: The characters in the Berry and Dolly stories are a bunch of tiny bugs and beetles who live alongside one another in the forest. The stories are lead by the title characters: Berry the snail and Dolly the ladybird. A variety of other characters join them in their fun and games throughout the series with the stories set in their forest home. All the characters’ houses, belongings and clothes perfectly match their individual appearance.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are having so much fun playing together, they dont want to say goodbye.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Bing accidentally leaves his Hoppity Voosh toy at the park, Amma helps Bing focus and retrace his steps to find it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are finally ready to leave for their picnic just as it starts to rain.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula invent a noisy game with a helium balloon they find stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Coco discovers Bing’s dressing up box so they both dress up. Coco is Princess Cococapono and Bing is, of course, King Bing. But there is only one crown and both need it to complete their outfits. When the crown gets broken Flop helps them to make new crowns out of the broken pieces.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The continuing problem with the town’s power keeps the Berrykin crews digging and the girls from doing their work—especially frustrating Cherry, who is struggling to write a song. Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! The girls divide into two teams, each leaving clues for the other that lead to funny objects. The team that collects all the objects first, wins the grand prize—a bag of banana chips from Strawberry’s Cafe that look like gold coins. While the girls have fun, Berrykins Ed and Earl struggle to uncross the crossed juice cables under the cafe floor. The power problem has given the appliances a life of their own, resulting in Earl thinking the cafe is haunted!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Woodsy and Scoutbadger are very excited: today is Prank Day! It’s a badger tradition, which consists in making small pranks to their friends and family. The two boys start with Rosie, and then keep going with their friends, in the forest. Although Edmund and Margaret have asked them not to push it too far, the twins do so and prank Rosie so much that they ruin her picnic… Asthey understand that they have gone too far, they decide to make up for it.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The snow in the meadow is so deep that Little Nutbrown Hare has to stay under the Old Oak tree. Wondering what he is going to do all day in deep snow and with no one to play with, his imagination soon takes over as he creates new kinds of fun. By the time his friends reach him, Little Nutbrown Hare can’t believe how the time has flown!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On a cold but sunny morning in the middle of Winter, Little Nutbrown Hare discovers his friends ice-skating on the frozen pond. He decides to give it a try but slips, slops and slides all over the ice. Will he persevere for long enough to be able to perfect his own unique style, or will he be put off by the natural skill of his friends?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, finds a strange little fish in the stream, which turns out to be a lost polliwog. Although Alfonso is sad when the polliwog returns to its frog family, their friendship doesnt end. Alfonso visits his tadpole friend every day, who soon develops into a real little frog.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Uncle Ramstout stored boxes in Sam and Julias secret lair. To avoid being invaded and lose their privacy, they must find a way to clear out his workshop in order to make room for those boxes.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: 24 days seem like a very long wait until Christmas. But the Triplets may have an idea to speed up time. What if they ate all the chocolates from their Christmas calendar at once? Of course, Mom is not happy and warns them: they had better be good, because Santa is watching and doesn’t bring gifts to kids who do not behave! Oh no, they only have three weeks to make up for a whole year of silly things!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Mom is having a dinner party at home tonight and she is running all over the place to finish cleaning the house in time. When she goes out to do a round-trip to the bakery, the Triplets decide to give her a hand. But nothing goes as planned: the vacuum cleaner brakes, the couch is stained and the corridor is full of soap. Be careful Mom, the floor is very very slippery!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Piper must limit playtime when the Trainees are assigned to bring food to the poor Mtambo.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman practices his magic act for the talent show, but it turns out that his assistant Mandy is better at magic than he is. But when he tries to make her disappear, he accidentally causes a fire. Meanwhile, Radar turns out to be quite the diva…

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Its time for the finale of the Pontypandy Festival - the Big Pontypandy Talent Show! But when Elvis knocks a drink over the drone control panel, the drones crash land, causing fires in the fields all around the show area.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: It’s Valentine’s Day, and Kate wants to make the best valentine ever for Dad! Kate tells her friends in Mimiloo all about Valentine’s Day, and everyone decides to make each other valentine’s gifts. But they’re so focused on making gifts, they spend all their time apart—which doesn’t feel much like a celebration at all!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: The storybook Mom is reading to Kate is missing its last page! In Mimiloo, Boomer can’t sleep because he’s lost his favorite book so Kate and Mim-Mim team up with their friends to act out the story. Mim-Mim doesn’t like being the big bad boogideebear and creates a clever new ending to the story.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: When Caillou loses his dinosaur toy, Rexy, he first panics, but then he imagines he’s a film noir detective trying to find his missing magnifying glass with his partner, Teddy. By staying calm and retracing Teddy’s steps, they find the magnifying glass and Caillou uses the same strategy to find Rexy.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: While playing bubbles with Grandpa, Caillou tries to teach Rosie how to blow bubbles properly, but she would rather do things her own way. Frustrated, Caillou pretends to be the Silver Knight training to be a wizard and discovers that there’s more than one way to cast a spell.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Christmas is fast approaching and it is the last chance for children to post their letters to Santa. Percy is collecting the mail, but there is a lot of snow on the rails and it isn’t easy to get through. Harold teasing Percy doesn’t help either, but when Percy runs into a snowdrift it is Harold who volunteers to take the letters for him. Percy is cross at having to be helped, but when Harold doesn’t come back it is Percy who goes to find out what happened and help him in return.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger 02 Mepe 7/52 - The Emu
programme.desc: It’s Easter! Kyle discovers a giant green egg that’s still warm while he’s on an Easter egg hunt. He thinks someone painted a giant chicken egg green for Easter and shows it off to Leo and Katie. But they later learn that it actually belongs to an Emu and that it’s important for them to return it to its nest for incubation. The rangers are on it!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kyle is worried for his pet spider, Parker - he seems a little moody these days. Leo suggests for Kyle to set Parker free in the wild to cheer the spider up. Kyle is onboard with the idea! Little does he know, Parker is not only a girl, she also happens to be a venomous redback spider. They have to warn Kyle to be careful and not to set it free carelessly. The rangers are on it!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Its Chinese Day at school and the children are looking forward to the celebrations.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The children of Greendale have been practising for karaoke night.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing gets very enthusiastic when he and Sula paint a mural and his painting starts to drop all over Sulas. Sula is upset until she realises that the painting isnt spoiled, its just different.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing gets stuck when he takes a game of hide-and-seek too far.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are building a sandcastle when Pando joins them in the sandpit with his wind-up digger toy to help. Bing finds a lovely ‘poiky thing’ in the sand and thinks it will make the perfect decoration for the top of his castle not realizing it belongs to Pando’s digger.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula collect acorns in the park with Flop, but Bings pile keeps shrinking.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is Its a Bing thing! which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald goes out to get some cocoa and a newspaper for Henry, who has a bad case of the Arctic Sniffles. On the way, Oswald encounters his friends, who all prescribe different cures – soup, warm clothes, and cough drops. Oswald winds up laden down with the various remedies, and gets caught in a rainstorm as he staggers back home. By then Henry is feeling better, and Oswald is the one with the sniffles!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: When Henry’s Cousin Louie comes to stay, Henry starts feeling homesick for the Frozen North. He decides there and then to go back with Cousin Louie and a sad Oswald goes round Big City to tell all of their friends. They gather at the bus stop to wish Henry bon voyage when suddenly a gust of wind takes the party balloons up into the air – along with Catrina! Everyone ends up hanging onto the balloons for dear life and Henry realises he has to make a choice - save his friends or catch the bus…

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Leo is late as he’s overslept thanks to staying up late playing a fishing game on his phone. Bob, Lofty, Leo and Wendy are installing a satellite dish and at the Spring City News HQ located at the docks. The dish has to be in place in time for the Six O’Clock News bulletin. En route to site the team stop to say hello to the Spring City Rockets who are practicing in preparation for a dance show later that day which will be covered on the news. On site Leo and Lofty are teamed up. During the build Leo is distracted by the game; Lofty suggests he should pay more attention. While tying the dish to Lofty’s hook Leo - distracted by the game - does not secure it properly. As Lofty raises the dish it comes loose and drops to the floor.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: After a solar panel demonstration, Mayor Madison decrees that the Sea Life Center will be entirely powered by renewable energy. Bob and the team must build a wind farm, which excites Scoop - he cant wait to see the spinny things going round. As they begin construction, Mr Bentley arrives and pulls Bob away, enthusing about other renewable energy schemes they have planned. Spring City will need more energy as it grows, so they need to think ahead. Scoop decides he should think ahead like Mr Bentley suggests, and convinces Lofty to move some of the turbines closer together.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Big Nutbrown Hare teaches Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends to play hide-and-seek, but the boisterous little hare finds it hard to stay still and quiet, especially when the Spring meadow is full of birds, butterflies and lizards to chase. When he does manage to stay still and quiet he finds the creatures of the meadow come to him… even very shy ones.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very special feather with bright colours, spots and soft tickly bits. Just as he shows off to his friends how it can fly and float, a cheeky bird flies away with it. Little Grey Squirrel climbs her tree and discovers the bird using it to feather her nest. Will Little Nutbrown Hare find a way to get his feather back, or will he decide that the bird needs it more than he does?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One Spring morning a cute spotty ladybird lands on Little Nutbrown Hare and seems to want to stay with him. All his friends admire the interesting little creature and he feels very special indeed. When she eventually flies away Little Nutbrown Hare follows her, wanting her back. But he understands why she left when he discovers she has lots of tiny spotty babies.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy and Yabba are doing a puppet show for the class. But there is a surprise puppet in the show. Who is it?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The new yellow t-shirt that Sally planned on wearing for her portrait painting has mysteriously turned green. Huckle and Lowly help Sally look for clues as to how this colour-change happened. They discover that mixing different colours results in the creation of a new one. It turns out that the dye from a blue blanket turned the yellow shirt green in the washing machine. / The kids discover pieces of a large metal hand, Huckle and gang are determined to find out to whom they belong.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Captain Messy is in the garden playing pirates. Equipped with his washing up bowl of bubbles – the seven seas; a rubber duck – the scariest pirate ship; and a big stone – Boulder Island, he plays float or sink. But why do some objects sink to the bottom of the seven seas whilst others stay floating at the top? He journeys to Okido to find out. “Ahoy there me mateys”, shouts Messy, as he lands at Zoe and Felix’s house. Zoe and Felix invite Messy on a boat trip to see the whales of Okido who gather only once every year to sing a beautiful whale song. “A chance to go aboard a pirate ship! That would be brilliant!” says Messy “Let’s Oki-go Arrr!”

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is in the living room playing his musical horn. PARP he sounds through a soft play tunnel but to Messy’s surprise he hears the loud PARP repeat back to him. That’s strange? He tilts his head inside “Hello?” To his astonishment he hears the same timid “hello” shout back at him but there’s no-one to be seen! Messy folds his arms and taps his foot “Well if you won’t tell me who you are I’m going to Okido to find out!” and vortexes himself to Okido. Messy arrives in Zoe and Felix’s garden. “Hello” shouts Messy. “Hello” Felix shouts back, but poor Messy can’t see where Felix is hiding and starts to feel uneasy.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: A blockage somewhere in the sparkleberry juice system that powers Berry Bitty City results in a repair crew of Berrykins invading the town with jackhammers. The girls leave for the day to avoid the noise and not get in the workers’ way. Trying to make the best of the situation, Strawberry gets an idea for the girls to have fun by holding their own berry bitty relay race—passing the baton from a sailboat race on the lake, to a steeple chase on frogs, to a sky race on birds.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry takes his blue and red robots into Dino World so that he can continue the battle they were having at home, but without Nanas scorn.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: After watching a movie about the life of a Cleopatra, the gang go to Dino World to make Patsy Queen.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kai is scuba diving underwater when a big shadow looming over him. Turns out its an ocean Sunfish, floating on its side. Kai then got scared when the fish moves its eyeball, Kai calms down and continue to be interest in the fish. Back in the garden, Leo And Katie are chilling in the shadow of a large tree. Hero appears and wanted to play with them as he fetch his squeaky toy. The Junior Rangers are lazy to play as they continue to laze around, upsetting Hero. Leo then receives a call from Kai about the new fish he discover. After learning more on the creature on Katies computer and learned that a pack of seagulls are harassing the fish, the Junior Rangers agrees to meetup with Kai to help. As they arrived, the seagulls are persisting in harassing while Kyle attempts to get them away. Leo and Katie tries to help, alongside Hero with his jetpack but it didnt work. The Junior Rangers are puzzled on why the fish dont move and thats when Ranger Rocky appear. They inform him of the situation, causing him to call up his good friend Ranger Joey. After Ranger Joey debriefing them with helpful information, they then sees the seagulls were actually picking parasites from the fish body. The fish then moves underwater causing the Junior Rangers to follow it. It stays underwater and decides not to move again. Hero gets distracted and has a short moment with a fish he encounters. After awhile, the sunfish spots a plastic bag in the ocean and decides to swim to it.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Judy and Jerome, the breakdown train, have been stuck at Knapford Yard for some time – having been somewhat superseded by Rocky and even Harvey. Ryan hears their sad story and offers to take them to Arelsburgh Harbour for a change of scenery. They love it there at first but soon take advantage of other engines so they can have a tour around the island. Meanwhile, Daisy has a run in with a bull and is derailed. When Thomas goes looking for the breakdown train, it is nowhere to be found! Ryan feels responsible – not just for Daisy but also to make sure Judy And Jerome get to be Really Useful. Ryan catches up with Judy and Jerome in the end and The Fat Controller is reminded how useful they can be. He decides they will have a new home at Arlesburgh with their friends Ryan and Daisy.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Daisy the railcar can carry passengers without having to pull any coaches. So, when Thomas is sent to work in the quarry for a spell and Daisy takes on his usual responsibilities, Annie and Clarabel are left behind. Daisy takes every opportunity to remind Annie and Clarabel that, as long as she is working Thomas’s branch line, they are not needed. But, when Daisy becomes popular with her passengers, she has to pull some passenger coaches after all! Annie and Clarabel get their own back by tricking Daisy into thinking she is need of repair. But two wrongs don’t make a right and Annie and Clarabel only end up being left behind in a siding… and then pulled along by dirty old Diesel! *Cough! Cough!*

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: During an expedition to the jungle, Smeraldo finds an ancient vase from the dragons’ age. Since he needs help to carry the relic to his lab, Grisu will join him in the mission. The job isn’t easy, as the vase is very frail and a bunch of wild animals - especially some cheeky toucans - will get in their way. But with the help of Smeraldo, Olivia and Stella (who sneaked onboard to take part in the adventure), Grisu manages to carry the precious object to a safe place.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: A shooting star has been seen above Dragontown. At it fell in the surrondings, Pr. Smeraldo wants to find it before the wind and the rain bury the stone. Unfortunately, he has a wide area to comb. Its a perfect mission for Grisu and Stella. Equiped with a metal detector, Grisu has to deal with many obstacles, among them Thingy who turns mad every time he hears the detector beeping. And you cant imagine how many metal things lie around. Not only cant Grisu and Stella find the precious meteorite, but also they collect metal waste such as an old whistle, a magnet, wire or a weathervane.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Big Nutbrown Hare teaches Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends to play hide-and-seek, but the boisterous little hare finds it hard to stay still and quiet, especially when the Spring meadow is full of birds, butterflies and lizards to chase. When he does manage to stay still and quiet he finds the creatures of the meadow come to him… even very shy ones.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very special feather with bright colours, spots and soft tickly bits. Just as he shows off to his friends how it can fly and float, a cheeky bird flies away with it. Little Grey Squirrel climbs her tree and discovers the bird using it to feather her nest. Will Little Nutbrown Hare find a way to get his feather back, or will he decide that the bird needs it more than he does?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Brewster is assigned to look after Ebo the elephant while some work is done on his enclosure. He decides to show Ebo where he lives. Ebo likes it at the depot because there is a pond to play in and he loves the chug wash. When it’s time to go home, Ebo doesn’t want to go back to the Safari Park. With Koko’s help, Brewster tricks him into the car, and returns Ebo to the park. Ebo is unhappy – until he sees the new water feature, that’s been built for him to play in!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie has agreed to lend her colored paint to Woodsy, so that he can paint a coat of arms on a pretty bark. But when she finds out that during her absence Scoutbadger has also borrowed some of her paint and emptied all the colors, she’s very unhappy! Fortunately, the twins have set about a quest to make it up to her…

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob, Leo, Muck and Scoop are at Fixham Castle to clear a courtyard wall and restore a bricked-up archway to its original splendour. Leo is taken by a statue of Sir Roger de Fixham riding a horse in the courtyard and Muck and Scoop play charging knights. After the wall is cleared they hear a strange beeping noise. It turns out to be Mr. Bentley who is searching for buried treasure with his metal detector. Bentley tells them The Legend of the Silver Shield – a shield that the knight on the statue originally held but which was later buried somewhere in the castle grounds. Scoop is transfixed! While Bob and the others knock out the bricks from the Archway, Scoop decides to dig around for buried treasure.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob tells a tired Scoop to stay behind at Bobs Yard as he goes to build an ice-cream kiosk at the beach. Scoop keeps finding spurious reasons to radio Bob and make him return to the yard. Finally there’s a real crisis but Bob doesnt believe its anything serious. Scoop takes a burning bin to the beach where it falls on the kiosk roof. Scoop saves the kiosk by scooping sand onto the roof.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Forgetful Mayor Fox has misplaced the giant key to the city that hes supposed to be presenting to a visiting astronaut. Huckle and his pals try to figure out where he set it down. They learn that Mayor Fox did one thing while touring a candy factory that required both his hands - stirring a huge pot of candy goo. Not far away they find a big chocolate-covered key./When Busytown residents are baffled by mysterious door knocking, Huckle and gang discover who it is.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In this episode, the Junior Rangers attempt to return a crab-eating macaque to the wild. Their knowledgeable friend, Ranger Rocky, assists them in their journey through the rainforest.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers take a baby smooth-coated otter to the rainforest to find its home. Unfortunately, a group of hungry crocodiles have their eyes on the little otter.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon finds himself caught between two secrets he has to keep! Gaspard’s, who is hiding his blankie so Mommy won’t wash it, and Mommy’s, who finds the blankie and decides to wash it anyway, without telling Gaspard, shhhhhhh it’s a secret! Simon absolutely has to make sure that Gaspard doesn’t go back to his blankie’s hiding place because then he’ll discover that Mommy has taken it and he’ll think that Simon told her! So Simon takes his little brother out in the yard to play.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry and Dolly gets a present but they start a fight to posess it. Finally turns out that they got a tandem bicycle.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is Its a Bing thing! which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: If youre very quiet and statue still, then the duckies will come. Today, Bing and Sula are at the park to feed the ducks. Sula is very good at standing still like a statue and only giving a small handful of food to the ducks when they come up to her. Bing, on the other hand, throws all the food into the water at once – not thinking that a big quacking goose will come along and eat it all in one bite!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its snack time! You can mix it up, but you cant mix it down again. Bing is eating a crunchy carrot, but he also wants a banana. However, the only one left is too mushy to eat, so Flop suggests making a smoothie with the milk and the banana. When Bings carrot accidentally ends up in the blender at top speed, the smoothie becomes a delicious milkshake. Will Bing like the carrot and banana smoothie?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula help Flop water plants in the garden. Bing finds a frog and wants to keep it, so he and Sula decide to build her a little house with a bucket. Sula and Bing prepare a cozy house with food and a bed, but the frog doesnt like the new house so it hops away. Where can she be?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Molly’s wool that she just bought disappeared! She’s sure that it must have been stolen, so Tilda and Rupert found the Appleseed Detective Agency. Are the friends going to catch the burglar?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert finds out that Molly has a beautiful singing voice and asks her if she can sing a song for Tildas birthday. Molly absolutely wants to do this but can she overcome her stage fright?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda launches an herbal delivery service, and demand is huge. But Billy and Benny mix up orders: now Rupert cant sleep, and Robin sleeps through his morning song. Tilda must fix the chaos.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After a long quiet winter in the meadow Little Nutbrown hare announces that he can’t wait for winter to be over so he can enjoy the other seasons with their special treats to see, hear and taste. Will the sound of icicles tinkling in the wind, the taste of a frozen Winter berry and some very unusual tracks in the snow convince the little hare that Winter is just as special as the other seasons?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare follows some unusual tracks in the snow that eventually lead him to a shy little spotty deer. He plays with his new friend every day, until she has to leave again with her mother to search for food. Little Nutbrown Hare is sad to see her go, but he’s also glad that he has friends that stay in the meadow all year round.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The snow in the meadow is so deep that Little Nutbrown Hare has to stay under the Old Oak tree. Wondering what he is going to do all day in deep snow and with no one to play with, his imagination soon takes over as he creates new kinds of fun. By the time his friends reach him, Little Nutbrown Hare can’t believe how the time has flown!

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon and Gaspard are camping with Grandma and Grandpa when Grandpa tells them about the forest fairies - Simons not convinced that they exist, but Grandpa insists that they do!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo, Katie and Hero travel to Peru to take a marvellous spatuletail home. But what can they do when the hungry bird falls into a deep sleep?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their badges, the trainees must be efficient when picking up litter, which means not wasting any time. Wilson and Koko race off, each determined to finish first. Methodical Brewster goes more slowly, sorting the litter as he goes into 3 different bins: paper, plastic and cans. Koko and Wilson deliver their messy loads to the recycling yard – but it won’t count until it’s sorted! While a happy Brewster collects his badge, Koko and Wilson are still sorting their litter....

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their badges, the trainees must go all day without speaking – but there’s a little room for error, as they’re each given three ‘lives.’ Wilson loses one of his lives when he shouts out during a Safari Park tour, chasing away the animals and spoiling the tour. He learns that by concentrating and breathing deeply he can control his need to make noise. Not only does he earn his badge, he gets the extra reward of seeing loads of wonderful animals that only come out when it’s quiet!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Nina is sure that her dog Loupiote is the fastest animal around! But T’choupi believes Brocoli the goat can move even faster! Nina rises to the challenge, and before you know it, Loupiote and Brocoli are unknowingly competing with each other in a race! But the dog and goat do whatever they please. And when Ciboulette the cat gets involved, it’s all downhill from there!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Tchoupi loves eating Fred’s goat’s cheese… but thinks again after getting a whiff of the goats’ pen: Ew!... So he’s very happy when Nina suggests they clean it out! Once they’re done with the cleaning, the two friends decide they could also make it more cozy. But shhh, not a word to anyone: it’s a surprise! However, after making the pen all spic and span and super comfortable, they’re shocked to find that the smell is still there!?! Thinking he’s found the perfect solution, Tchoupi sprays Mom’s perfume inside the pen… But what do the goats’ think of this new scent inside their house…?

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While out walking in the forest, Benedicte sets a challenge for Tchoupi and Nina – to find their way back home all by themselves, using landmarks they come across along the way. programme.title: Charley Goes To School

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam is passionately reading a book. But Julia accidentally damages the last few pages of it. How Julia could she reinvent for her friend the end of the interrupted story to calm Sams frustration?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia is impressed by Sarah, Sams older sister, who is preparing to sing on the theater stage. Julia does everything to attend the rehearsals but its not always easy to get noticed by a big girl.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas loses his voice trying to sing opera like his Italian friends, and tries to find a new way to pass on a very important message

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: One day while levelling the site for Wellsworth Hospital’s new parking lot/car park, Brenda finds that someone had dumped a large mound of stone right in her cleaned-up work site. Everyone soon finds the answer and the outcome is also quite convenient for both the pack and Brenda.

programme.desc: Nina and Dad have fun imitating birdsongs and are very good at it. Tchoupi, however, is totally unable to join in: singing like a bird isn’t his forte! programme.desc: Old Puffer Pete has been working in Chuggington for 150 years, and the mayor wants to commemorate his anniversary with a special show. The trainees are going to do a carefully choreographed routine - but it all goes wrong. Wilson doesn’t listen, Koko goes too fast, and Brewster doesn’t seem to know his right from his left! Dunbar says they’ll have one more go in the morning, but if it’s not right - they’ll have to cancel the show. The chuggers really want to do something special for Pete, so that night they sneak into the training yard and practice.

programme.title: Chuggington 02
programme.desc: Vee needs someone to pull the royal carriage for the prince of Buffertonia. Chuggers race in to get the job, but Harrison is first - thanks to cutting some corners and running a red light or two. Happy to have the job, he goes off with Puffer Pete to learn the route. Pete notices that Harrison has got into some bad habits. He takes shortcuts, ignores signs and breaks the speed limit. Pete tells Vee she’d better find someone else to pull the prince’s carriage. A desperate Harrison says he’ll do anything to keep the job!

programme.title: Charley Goes To School

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave

programme.title: Doodleboo

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the scorching North African Savanna, Jane and Zumi are exhausted from the dry season. Jane shares her last sip of water with Zumi before discovering a weakened Common Kingfisher on the ground and decides to help the bird. Leo and Katie are in the garden having a tower-building competition before Hero accidentally knocks down Leo’s tower. They then get a call from Jane who lets them know about the bird. Through the computer, the rangers learn about the birds habitat and feeding habits. After Jane tells them she has no more water to give to the Kingfisher, the team rush to Africa where Leo gives the Kingfisher some water to strengthen up. They travel to a nearby river to relocate it and after spotting a fox in the area, they decide to build a nest for it to ensure its safety. Ranger Rocky and Ranger Joey guide them in building a kingfisher’s nest, and with teamwork, the Junior Rangers successfully construct a burrow on the riverbank, allowing the bird to be safe and find comfort in its new habitat. In the Garden, Katie successfully builds a tower, about to claim her victory before Hero accidentally and innocently crashes into it much to Katie’s annoyance.

programme.desc: Koko gets a hydraulic power booster upgrade to make her super strong but with her newfound strength, disastrous consequences ensue around Chuggington.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Determined to prove he is the best superhero in town, Norman Man takes on a glitchy robotic dog that sparks a job for the fire squad.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Ellie takes the junior cadets into the woods for a training day, but Sam must get things under control when a canister explodes.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate loves banana pancakes, but Dad prefers carrot pancakes—yuck! In Mimiloo, Lily hosts a Snifferific Contest to see who has the best-smelling item. Boomer’s entry, a stinky yuckabush, covers Boomer in a smelly cloud. It gets amplified by Tack’s latest invention, which gives Boomer the ability to play smelly tag, making his friends stinky too!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate was looking forward to all her favorite stops on a road trip to the beach, so she’s disappointed to learn they’re taking a different route this time. In Mimiloo, Kate and her friends embark on a road trip to the Distant Dunes to go sand surfing, but a series of obstacles take them on some unexpected detours!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: When Caillou’s friends mistakenly think that his dad is a treasure hunter, Caillou feels very special until Ms. Martin invites Daddy to visit his class. Unsure what to do, Caillou pretends to be an explorer whose assistant (Daddy) must learn to be honest in order to find the treasure.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: Caillou wants his cold to go away immediately so he can play pirates with his friends. But when he goes into a pirate captain fantasy and rushes though his ship’s repairs instead of taking the time to fix it properly, he realizes how important it is to be patient with his own body.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Philip spots Toby and assumes that he is a diesel boxcab just like him. Convinced that they will become best friends, Philip rushes up to introduce himself, but Toby finds him rather overwhelming. Philip is very persistent and manages to get Toby to have a race with him, but Toby doesn’t like it very much. Philip gets upset and thinks Toby doesn’t like him, but with a little help he eventually learns that you can be friends with someone who doesn’t like the same things you like.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A red kangaroo steals Kyles beloved toy kangaroo, Stella. The rangers are on it! They realise that the kangaroo has mistaken Stella for its joey. To get Stella back, theyll have to find her joey and swap them.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zumi accidentally destroys a large bird nest that belongs to the Sociable Weavers. To fix it is a big job, but nothing is too big when you work as a team.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat is delivering two things - Dottie the hamster and a didgeridoo from Australia.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ajays organised a Summer Special day on the green, but the sun is too hot.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Flop is feeling poorly so Bing decides to look after him. When Bing tries to make Flop a honey-lemon drink he ends up making a big mess instead.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Sula and Pando and me did music all together.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are playing a vooshing game with their favourite toys, Hoppity Voosh and Hippo Fairy. They throw them into the air to see how high they can fly – Voooooosh! Uh-oh…Sula’s hippo gets stuck in a tree so Bing throws Hoppity up to save her, only for Hoppity to get stuck too.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando are playing outside in the cold, blowing steamy dragon breath at each other and discovering icicles hanging from the tap. Flop makes hot chocolate to warm everybody up but Bing can’t wait for it to cool down before he can drink it and burns his fingers – Pando’s quick thinking brings the icicle to the rescue.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Charlie is coming to play and Bing has planned lots of things for them to do. But when Charlie arrives he doesn’t want to play any of the games Bing has put out. Bing is upset until Flop suggests they watch to see what Charlie really wants to do. Charlie heads straight for the kitchen where he, and Bing, have a great time making music with pots and pans.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: While housesitting for Henry, Daisy breaks his favourite fish vase. Oswald advises her to simply tell Henry what happened, but Daisy, worried that Henry will be angry with her, is sure theres another way out. She tries to mend the vase, buy a new one, and make a replica, but all her efforts fail. Daisy despairs, but Oswald reminds her that she has ruffled Henrys feathers many times before and they are still friends. Daisy confesses the truth to Henry only to discover he has an entire cupboard full of fish vases!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald is excited to meet Henrys cousin, Louie, but as the penguins catch up on old times, Oswald feels left out. Convinced they don’t want him around, Oswald goes home. The penguins suddenly notice Oswald is missing and seek him out. Henry tells Louie what a great friend Oswald is. Happy again, Oswald plays the piano as Henry and Louie dance the Penguin Polka together.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob announces there’s been a Spring City Clock Competition to design the new Spring City Clock – and guess who’s won? The Spring City Rockets! Bob shows the Machines their winning design and explains that metal figures will emerge and sound the bells on the clock. Wendy has been welding the metal figures together. Leo arrives and is looking forward to helping Bob with the decorative cladding around the clock tower but Bob tells him it’s Recycling Day today and his job is to take all the recycling to the Centre first. Bob and the Machines set off to the site while Leo and Muck gather up the boxes of recycling from around the Yard. But Leo is in such a hurry that he mistakes the box with the metal figures in for recycling and dumps it at the Recycling Centre.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Saffi has won a “Design a Statue” competition and now Bob and the team are turning her design into a water-fountain for the shopping mall. Saffi explains that her elephant statue design was based on her favourite toy, Mr Trunkers, but has since lost him. So when Muck is chosen to deliver the elephant statue, he promises to take extra special care of it for Saffi. But in his excitement, Muck accidentally knocks the elephant into a wall and scrapes off its paint. Muck can’t quite bring himself to own up to Saffi, so decides to tell Bob what has happened first. On his way to tell Bob, Muck overhears Anish telling Saffi how proud he is of her statue. Muck panics and ends up damaging the elephant more.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: It is a sunny Spring day in the meadow and Little Nutbrown Hare is enjoying all it has to offer. As the day wears on a heavy grey cloud forces Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse to seek shelter from the rain. Will the friends let a little water ruin their fun or will they discover that rainy days can be just as exciting.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is disappointed when a trail of ants disappears with the delicious Spring berries he’s found. He’s convinced that ants are not very nice, and only after Big Nutbrown Hare explains how the ants were probably taking the berries home to their families does Little Nutbrown Hare forgive them. And when he sees how clever the ants are, he soon wants to be like them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The Summer meadow is home to a many amazing treasures of nature. When Little Nutbrown Hare finds a beautiful blue butterfly, he and Little Field Mouse go on a hunt for other blue treasures to bring back and show Big Nutbrown Hare, including blueberries, blue bells and even blue eggshells. Meanwhile, Big Nutbrown Hare has discovered the biggest blue treasure of them all. What could it be?

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Each episode of centres around a narrative story, introducing key vocabulary and addressing specific learning outcomes, finishing with a reward dance to congratulate the viewer for completing the lesson.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: All the balls at Farmer Patrick Pigs new mini putt are disappearing. After much investigation Huckle and the gang track the missing balls to Patricks record breaking ‘egg laying’ chicken. / When the gold coins Mr Fix It finds on the beach disappear, Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to find out where they went.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world Messy is in the bathroom looking for his toothbrush. “My teeth are pretty dirty – even for a Messy Monster!” he says. He dives into the laundry basket frantically launching socks and clothes in search of his toothbrush but has no such luck. “But why do I have to brush my teeth? Why can’t I just clean them with water?” He transports himself to Okido to find out. Messy arrives in Okido where Zoe and Felix are cleaning a very dirty looking Okidoodle. “He went off road and got all muddy” Zoe explains. “Maybe we need to scrub it off?” Felix picks up a broom and starts to scrub Okidoodle whilst Messy sprays with the water hose. Together they make lots of muddy puddles!

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: It’s a grey day in the real world. Messy monster is looking out of the window and sees something he’s ever seen before. A beautiful arch made up of every colour you can possibly imagine appears between the clouds. Bigger and bigger it gets, as it stretches across the gloomy grey sky, but what is it? “When you need to know, go to OKIDO” says Messy and he transports himself to Okido to find out.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The continuing problem with the town’s power keeps the Berrykin crews digging and the girls from doing their work—especially frustrating Cherry, who is struggling to write a song. Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! The girls divide into two teams, each leaving clues for the other that lead to funny objects. The team that collects all the objects first, wins the grand prize—a bag of banana chips from Strawberry’s Cafe that look like gold coins. While the girls have fun, Berrykins Ed and Earl struggle to uncross the crossed juice cables under the cafe floor. The power problem has given the appliances a life of their own, resulting in Earl thinking the cafe is haunted!

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry returns from a day out at a theme park and finds that Steggy is missing.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry wants to grow some roses for Mothers day but he needs them to grow in just one day so he goes to Dino-World where flowers grow quickly.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zari explores mangrove mudflats, discovering a moulted shell of a Mangrove Horseshoe Crab. In the Hero Garden, Leo and Katie engage in a toy jumping competition, using a DIY see-saw, while Hero watches. Leo receives a call from Zari, who found the crab shell, prompting Leo and Katie to investigate using the computer. Katie provides information about the Mangrove Horseshoe Crab, and the team rushes to Zaris aid when she gets stuck in the mud when she tries to approach an overturned crab. They travel in PlatypusOne and rescue Zari, then discover a group of overturned crabs, which makes their skin crawl at the creepy sight. They meet Ranger Rocky who calls up Ranger Joey. She provides information about the harmless crabs and how to flip them back up, safely. The Junior Rangers overcome their fear and, with Heros assistance, successfully flip the crabs. Back in the treehouse, Leo hangs up a picture of the mangrove horseshoe crab, celebrating the missions success. Ranger Rocky praises the Junior Rangers as they throw Hero’s treats to him via the same see-saw from earlier.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Snow comes early to the Island of Sodor – and it is heavier than usual! Donald and Douglas are coupled back-to-back with a van between their tenders and snowploughs on their fronts. Donald and Douglas keep squabbling about which line they should clear first, culminating in a big argument. Donald pulls away hard, snapping a damaged coupling and moving away with Douglas’s tender! So Douglas is left behind in the snow – without coal or water! The time apart helps cool the brothers’ tempers. They are delighted to be reunited in the end – and share water and coal from their tenders. Brothers!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: James likes to show off and be the centre of attention, but when he doesn’t get his own way, he sulks and pouts. One day James is showing off so much that the passengers start complaining so the Fat Controller takes his coaches away. James starts to pout and he is still pouting the next morning. He is so sulky and rude that the Fat Controller leaves him in his shed. Eventually James apologises and the Fat Controller gives him some work to do, but when James discovers that he’s pulling waste trucks he starts sulking again and it is only when his friends help him laugh at himself that James finally manages to find a way to dowhat he has to do, and even enjoy it!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Toramento is exhausted because of his job, so Grisu tries to help him by boosting a malfunctioning and slow cleaning robot to do the job in his place. But the boosted robot is not easy to control and makes a mess all around the city, also because Thingy wants to play with it, sending the machine haywire. Eventually Grisu understands that Toramento doesn’t need a robot doing the job in his place, but a care-giving device that provides coffee and massages, keeping his stamina up.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Checking the safety items at the watch tower in the forest, Emma realizes that the alarm system doesnt work anymore. Grisu suggest using the old fire station alarm bell. Great idea! Unfortunately, David, whos supposed to set it up, is called for an intervention and must leave. Grisu offers his help.Here is Grisu and Stella heading to the forest with the old bell on a cart. The noisy bell creates some confusion in the forest since everybody thinks theres a fire. Not mentioning Michel, Gertruds very talkative parrot who cant help but imitating every sound and voice he hears. The mission turns into a catastrophe when Grisu burns the bell… right when a fire starts into the forest. But Grisu is resourceful, as always, and he uses Michel as a spare alarm bell.

Vit eru við, tá alment jolatræ fyri fyrstu ferð verður tendrað í lítlu bygdini Norðtoftum í Borðoynni. Og saman við trimum systkjum úr Múla vitja vit barnaheimið í heimbygdini, har eingin býr fast longur. Tey greiða frá, hvussu tað var í Múla um jolini í teirra uppvøkstri. programme.title: Heim, kæra heim III
programme.desc: Á Leitisvegi á Glyvrum búgva Trygvi Joensen og Elsa Færø Joensen. Húsið var í 70unum eitt satt marglætishús, sum vinnulívsmaðurin Sofus Thomsen lat byggja. Og júst 70ara marglæti sæst framvegis í dag, tí í húsinum finna vit eitt nú vatnkranar úr gulli og ein svimjihyl. Í Bø hava Hanna Muller og maðurin umvælt eini gomul sethús til frítíðarhús. Húsið, sum er meir enn 150 ára gamal, er fjorða húsið, sum á sinni bleiv bygt í Bø. Her møtir nýmotans innbúgv aldargomlum lutum í hugnaligu húsunum, har familjan kann taka sær av løttum.

programme.title: Eingin ger pápa mínum onáðir

Nú stríðist sonurin fyri rættvísi ? og fyri at brota arvin av harðskapi og tøgn, sum hevur merkt teirra samband.Framleiðsluár: 2025Framleitt fyri: TV 2 DANMARKAldursmark: 7 ár

programme.title: Gler fyri millionir
programme.desc: (A Frozen Christmas).Ísur, gler og kavi er vakurt tilfar, men kann vera svikaligt, ostøðugt og broytiligt at arbeiða við, og tað krevur nogv av teimum, sum handfara tað frysta vatnið. Vit hitta folk, sum arbeiða við gleri/ísi alt árið í tí kalda, blomandi millionaídnaðinum av marglætisframleiðslu, sum kann vera alt frá glerhotellum til storar standmyndir, -ella ísterningar.Prísur fyri ísterningarnar? Upp í 800 kr. fyri 12 stk!! Upprunaheiti: A Frozen Christmas.Framleiðsluár: 2015

programme.title: Bátasmiðirnir
programme.desc: Bátasmiðirnir - norsk sending frá 2021.Bátasmiðirnir er ein filmur um kunnleika til siðbundið bátasmíð í Noregi. Vit fylgja trimum ungum bátasmiðum og lærimeistarum teirra . Filmur hjá felagnum norske KYSTEN og Oslo Filmkompani.Violinisturin Nora Taksdal úr Norska útvarpsorkestrinum hevur gjørt tonleikin til filmin.

programme.title: Gekkur
programme.desc: Vit halda 25 ára føðingardag hjá Gekkinum í kvøld. Gekkurin verður frameftir sendur í nýggjum hami og nýggir vinningar eru í fokus. Upphæddirnar á hjolinum hækka, so tað nú ber til at vinna millum 20.000 og 50.000 kronur á hjolinum. Og ein Volvo-bilur fer í annan leypin og ein luksus-cruise til Bahamas við 50.000 kronum í lummapeningi í hin leypin. Stora gekkaupphæddin er í triðja leypinum.Raðspælið verður eisini meira spennandi, tí ein krússapottur við virði á 50.000 kronur fjalir seg aftan fyri eina av lúkunum.

programme.title: Í menniskjum goður tokki
programme.desc: Árliga jola- og stuðulskonsertin hjá Barnabata, Í menniskjum goður tokki. Við at stuðla Í menniskjum goður tokki kunnu vit hjálpa føroyskum barnafamiljum, ið liva í fátækraváða. Eisini eru áhugaverdar samrøður á skránni.

programme.title: A Bad Moms Christmas
programme.desc: Hjá teimum trimum ovbyrjaðu smábarnamammunum, Amy, Kiki og Carlu, er mammu heimsmeistaraheiti fyri framman: Jolini. Tær eru samdar um, ikki at lata seg ávirka av jolarokinum, mongum brestur ætlan, tá ið mammur teirra, eina viku fyri jolaaftan, boða frá, at tær koma at halda jol, fáa tær jolastress kortini. Men tær tríggjar eldru mammurnar syrgja fyri, at tað verða eini heilt serlig jol í ár.

programme.title: Les incroyables talents de la musique
programme.desc: Une selection des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux passes sur la scène de La France a un incroyable talent ! Revivez le parcours fabuleux des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur voix extraordinaire… L’occasion de redecouvrir aussi d’anciens talents sortis depuis de l’anonymat.

programme.desc: Programmes de nuit

programme.title: Incroyables transformations
programme.desc: Des experts de la mode (Charla Carter, Lea Djadja et Nicolas Waldorf) ont cree une agence pas comme les autres pour venir en aide à des clients qui se plaignent du look de lun de leurs proches, quil est urgent de changer ! Mais pour nos experts, pas de soucis, car aucun look ne les arrete…

programme.title: Incroyables transformations
programme.desc: 3 experts de la mode ont cree une agence pas comme les autres pour venir en aide à des clients qui se plaignent du look de… lun de leurs proches ! Ces 3 experts mettront leur talent au service de tous leurs clients et feront aussi appel à un chirurgien plasticien, Frederic Lange, pour connaître toutes les dernières techniques en matière de medecine esthetique.La styliste Charla Carter, la cosmeticienne Lea Djadja, le coiffeur visagiste Nicolas Waldorf voient chaque jour un defile improbable et particulièrement drôle de clients qui se plaignent du look de… lun de leurs proches quil est urgent de changer ! Et quels looks : trop excentriques, trop sexy, avec un goût particulier et un peu trop prononce ou au contraire sans le moindre goût ! Attendez-vous à decouvrir le pire.Mais pour nos experts, pas de soucis, car aucun look ne les arrete… En utilisant les techniques les plus modernes de chacune de leur specialite et en ayant recours à la medecine esthetique, ils realisent chaque jour dincroyables transformations.Alors, suivez leur travail dans cette drôle dagence qui vous offrira de nombreuses emotions et… chocs visuels !

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver
programme.desc: « Ça peut vous arriver » donne la parole à toutes les parties pour que toutes les situations litigieuses trouvent un denouement positif ! Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, va tout tenter pour resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques.

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver
programme.desc: « Ça peut vous arriver » donne la parole à toutes les parties pour que toutes les situations litigieuses trouvent un denouement positif ! Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, va tout tenter pour resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques.

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver chez vous
programme.desc: Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, tente de resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques. Des envoyes speciaux sillonnent les regions, recueillent les temoignages et illustrent les cas en images.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Le 1245
programme.desc: Retrouvez toute lactualite de la mi-journee.

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: Un jour, un doc
programme.desc: « Un jour, un doc », le magazine qui vous fait decouvrir des loisirs, metiers et activites extraordinaires de Français, dans lHexagone et à l’etranger. Positif, informatif, depaysant, « Un jour, un doc » met en avant des personnalites et des lieux, tels que vous ne les avez jamais vus.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: Chaque jour, trois candidats vont s’affronter en cinq manches. Ils devront resoudre une enigme en decouvrant un mot, le nom d’un personnage ou des expressions. Les candidats doivent trouver ce mot ou cette expression en faisant apparaître progressivement les lettres qui le composent. Pour proposer une lettre, ils tournent une roue à tour de rôle.

programme.title: La meilleure boulangerie de France
programme.desc: Chaque jour, 2 boulangeries dune meme region saffrontent. La boulangerie gagnante obtient une place pour esperer representer sa region en finale nationale. La selection se fait sur deliberation du jury le vendredi (jusquà la saison 6, il y avait 2 epreuves pour departager les gagnants (inter)departementaux).

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Le 1945

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: Scènes de menages : la magie de Noël
programme.desc: Les couples de Scènes de menages ne vont pas vivre un Noël comme les autres ! Entre Liliane qui percute le vrai Père Noël, Raymond qui reveillonne avec son « lui-enfant », Emma et Fabien qui negocient avec un renne en peluche, Camille qui invite le pire ennemi de Phillipe pour un reveillon sacrement mouvemente et Alice et Sofiane qui fournissent la Mère Noël en cadeaux… Ce reveillon s’annonce aussi drôle que fantastique !

programme.title: Scènes de menages : la magie de Noël

programme.title: Scènes de menages : un Noël complètement givre
programme.desc: Si pour certains Noël est synonyme de joie et de moments partages en famille, pour les couples de Scènes de menages rien n’est moins sûr !

programme.title: Programmes de nuit
programme.desc: Programmes de nuit

programme.title: Incroyables transformations
programme.desc: 3 experts de la mode ont cree une agence pas comme les autres pour venir en aide à des clients qui se plaignent du look de… lun de leurs proches ! Ces 3 experts mettront leur talent au service de tous leurs clients et feront aussi appel à un chirurgien plasticien, Frederic Lange, pour connaître toutes les dernières techniques en matière de medecine esthetique.La styliste Charla Carter, la cosmeticienne Lea Djadja, le coiffeur visagiste Nicolas Waldorf voient chaque jour un defile improbable et particulièrement drôle de clients qui se plaignent du look de… lun de leurs proches quil est urgent de changer ! Et quels looks : trop excentriques, trop sexy, avec un goût particulier et un peu trop prononce ou au contraire sans le moindre goût ! Attendez-vous à decouvrir le pire.Mais pour nos experts, pas de soucis, car aucun look ne les arrete… En utilisant les techniques les plus modernes de chacune de leur specialite et en ayant recours à la medecine esthetique, ils realisent chaque jour dincroyables transformations.Alors, suivez leur travail dans cette drôle dagence qui vous offrira de nombreuses emotions et… chocs visuels !

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver
programme.desc: « Ça peut vous arriver » donne la parole à toutes les parties pour que toutes les situations litigieuses trouvent un denouement positif ! Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, va tout tenter pour resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques.

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver chez vous
programme.desc: Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, tente de resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques. Des envoyes speciaux sillonnent les regions, recueillent les temoignages et illustrent les cas en images.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: Le premier concours amateur entièrement consacre à la pâtisserie. Les candidats viennent de la France entière et meme de Belgique pour saffronter avec leurs meilleures recettes et relever les defis des juges.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: Le premier concours amateur entièrement consacre à la pâtisserie. Les candidats viennent de la France entière et meme de Belgique pour saffronter avec leurs meilleures recettes et relever les defis des juges.

programme.title: Rendez-vous chez Cyril Lignac
programme.desc: Cyril Lignac accueille chez lui trois personnalites. Avec sa chaleur aveyronnaise, il les embarque pour une soiree conviviale, placee sous le signe de la cuisine et des confidences. À travers des plats qui ont marque leur enfance ou leur parcours, Cyril decouvre ses invites autrement : plus intimes, plus vrais, comme on ne les a jamais vus. Entree, plat, dessert : chacun prend son tour aux fourneaux.

programme.title: Rendez-vous chez Cyril Lignac
programme.desc: Cyril Lignac accueille Tom Villa, Sophie Tapie et Seth Gueko pour une soiree conviviale, placee sous le signe de la cuisine et des confidences. Entree, plat, dessert : chacun prend son tour aux fourneaux. Puis vient la degustation où le chef livrera son avis d’expert et partagera un vrai moment de complicite avec ses invites. Et si c’etait autour d’un plat que les celebrites se montraient les plus authentiques ?

programme.title: Pekin express : la route des glaces
programme.desc: Pour cette cinquième etape, les candidats affrontent les elements en traversant le parc national d’Altyn-Emel. L’arrivee sur le lac gele de Kapchagaï promet un spectacle grandiose. L’Heure espagnole . Gianni Schicchi . Valencia, Palau de les Arts, 2 May 2025.

programme.title: Orchestre de Paris, Klaus Makela: Saariaho, Strauss, Lopez, Dusapin, Scriabin
programme.desc: Kaija Saariaho (born in 1952) Asteroid 4179: Toutatis. Richard Strauss (1864 – 1949) Also sprach Zarathustra. Jimmy Lopez Bellido (born in 1978). Pascal Dusapin (born in 1955). Alexander Scriabin (1872 – 1915) Poème de lExtase. Paris, Philharmonie, September 8, 2022.

programme.title: Gergely Madaras, Philharmonique Royal de Liège : Brahms, Dohnányi

programme.title: Berlioz : La Damnation de Faust - Theâtre des Champs-Elysees, Paris
programme.desc: La Damnation de Faust ‘Legende dramatique’ in four parts by Hector Berlioz (1803-1869) Libretto by Hector Berlioz and Almire Gandonnière after Gerard de Nerval’s translation of ‘Faust’ by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe First performance in Paris, Opera-Comique, December 6, 1846. Paris, Theâtre des Champs-Elysees, 15 November 2025.

programme.title: Ljubljana Festival: Rimski-Korsakov, Falla, Bernstein
programme.desc: Nikolaj Rimski-Korsakov 1844-1908 Spanish Capriccio, op. 34. Manuel de Falla 1876 - 1946. Leonard Bernstein 1918 - 1990 Symphonic Dances from West Side Story. Ljubljana, Gallus Hall, Cankarjev dom, 2 July 2025.

programme.title: Evgeny Kissin : Bach, Chopin, Shostakovich - Verbier Festival
programme.desc: Johann Sebastian Bach 1685-1750 Partita No. 2 in C minor BWV 826. Frederic Chopin 1810-1849 Nocturne in C-sharp minor Op. 27 No. 1 Nocturne in A flat major Op. 32 N° 2 Scherzo No. 4 in E major op. 54. Dmitri Shostakovich 1906-1975 Piano Sonata No. 2 in B minor op. 61 Prelude and Fugue in D flat major op. 87 N° 15 Prelude and Fugue in D minor op. 87 N° 24. Verbier, Salle des Combins, July 21, 2025.

programme.title: Silvesterkonzert Staatskapelle Dresden
programme.desc: Gottfried Huppertz Excerpts from the suite for the film Metropolis (1927). Ralph Erwin I kiss your hand, Madame from the film of the same name (1929) Werner Richard Heymann Theres only one time, that wont come back from the film The Congress Dances (1931). Anton Profes What is Maier doing in the Himalayas? Based on an arrangement by Marek Weber. Werner Richard Heymann »Somewhere in the world« from the film »A blond dream«. George Gershwin Rhapsody in Blue. Leonello Casucci Just a Gigolo. George Gershwin Someone to Watch Over Me from the musical Oh, Kay! I Got Rhythm from the musical Girl Crazy. In Hispanias hot summer country from the revue operetta Casanova I stand by you - I love you from the revue operetta Casanova. programme.title: Electronic Vibrations - A sound changes the world
programme.desc: Whether techno or hip-hop – electronic music is nowadays the driving force of pop culture. We have almost forgotten that its origins lie in the WDR’s electronic studio, which made Cologne to one of the centres of the avant-garde during the post-war years. This is the story of how a room full of strange devices would become a cabinet of curiosities, the vibrations of which sent the whole world in a state of ecstasy. From the beginnings directly after the Second World War in Paris with Pierre Schaeffer’s ‘musique concrète’, the film focuses on Stockhausen and goes on to Kraftwerk, from Jean-Michel Jarre and the IRCAM studio right up to Detroit to the beginnings of techno.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Rivalites musicales - Callas contre Tebaldi
programme.desc: Maria Callas and Renata Tebaldi were the two most famous sopranos of the second half of the last century. Turned into hostile enemies by their admirers, the two became untouchable goddesses of opera. For their fans, Callas was known as the tigress, Tebaldi as the voice of an angel: the two singers could hardly have been more different, whether in their professional or private lives. To this day, Callas remains perhaps the greatest soprano of all time. Her rival, Tebaldi, is best known to opera lovers. Why is the posthumous fame of the two prima donnas so different?Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Rivalites musicales - Furtwangler contre Toscanini
programme.desc: Two men without whom the profession of conductor would not be what it is today. Two men who couldnt be more different from each other: Arturo Toscanini and Wilhelm Furtwangler. The former was rigorously faithful to the musical score, the latter conducted with radical subjectivity. In 1931 they both conducted at the Bayreuth Festival – for the first and last time. Soon the polite rivalry turned into bitter enmity. Both men were forced to take a stand on the regimes in their respective countries – and chose radically different paths. Toscanini, the dictator, bravely challenged Mussolini; Furtwangler, a conservative, meanwhile proclaimed that art is always apolitical and reluctantly made a pact with the Nazis. The documentary not only opens up the different musical universes of the two great conductors by retracing their careers in Milan, Bayreuth and New York, but also raises a question that is more topical than ever: what has art to do with politics?Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra, Santtu-Matias Rouvali: Thorvaldsdottir, Morricone, Shostakovich
programme.desc: Anna Thorvaldsdottir (born 1977) Metacosmos. Ennio Morricone (1928 – 1920). Dmitri Shostakovich (1906 – 1975) Symphony No. 15 in A major Op. 141. Directed by Ferenc Soeteman Amsterdam, Concertgebouw, 24 March 2023.

programme.title: Closed - A Ballet from Real Life
programme.desc: Many people live in a closed world. What happens to them when they step onto an arena where they can be themselves, free of their usual roles and status? In the film Closed we encounter four completely different people who once a week leave their everyday lives and get together in a closed cafe, where they get the opportunity and help to relax and momentarily distance themselves from reality. These encounters have a certain touch of ritual to them. Here, the participants dare to open themselves up to external impressions. They allow themselves to be affected by each other’s liberated exposures and to respond positively to what society at large would regard as strange behaviour. Two men, one woman and a proprietor who is obsessed with cleaning. The smallest speck of dust must be removed immediately. He always has a dust cloth to hand. This externalized and bizarre behaviour is challenging to himself as well as to those around him. Music: Zoltan Kodály’s Sonata for solo cello Op. 8 by cellist Truls Mørk.

programme.title: David Oistrakh, Artist of the People ?
programme.desc: The dramatic story of an inspired violinist, of a loyal man whose self-imposed silence eloquently betrayed unspoken private suffering. This extensive profile features interviews with David Oistrakhs longtime friends and fellow musicians: Yehudi Menuhin showing what it takes to make a great violinist; Mstislav Rostropovitch talking of Oistrakhs relationship with the Soviet regime; Gidon Kremer recalling Oistrakh as a teacher; Gennady Rozhdestvensky who conducted all the major concertos for him.

programme.title: Strauss: An Alpine symphony - DSO Berlin, Robin Ticciati, Reinhold Messner
programme.desc: Richard Strauss 1864 - 1949 Eine Alpensinfonie. Berlin, Tempodrom, 2021. Recorded at Berlin’s Tempodrom, the Deutsche Symphonie-Orchester Berlin and its chief conductor Robin Ticciati present Richard Strauss’s ‘An Alpine Symphony’ as a musical and philosophical mountain hike with the legendary mountaineer Reinhold Messner. The concert leads us through the Alps, lets the audience pass flowering meadows en route, through thickets and underbrush, over mountain pastures and glaciers to the summit, and finally the descent surrounded by thunderstorms. Messner provides insights into the physical and psychological borderline experiences of his mountain ascents and speaks about extreme situations, the perception of nature, and his mental state on the night before departure, during the conquest of the peak, during the long, onerous descent and the exhausted, contented return home.. Directed by Andreas Morell.

programme.title: Electronic Vibrations - A sound changes the world
programme.desc: Whether techno or hip-hop – electronic music is nowadays the driving force of pop culture. We have almost forgotten that its origins lie in the WDR’s electronic studio, which made Cologne to one of the centres of the avant-garde during the post-war years. This is the story of how a room full of strange devices would become a cabinet of curiosities, the vibrations of which sent the whole world in a state of ecstasy. From the beginnings directly after the Second World War in Paris with Pierre Schaeffer’s ‘musique concrète’, the film focuses on Stockhausen and goes on to Kraftwerk, from Jean-Michel Jarre and the IRCAM studio right up to Detroit to the beginnings of techno.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control
